txt_en: True love lasts a lifetime.
txt_cn: 唯有真爱，一生永恒。

txt_en: Every once in a while, you find someone who's iridescent.
txt_cn: 斯人若彩虹，遇上方知有。

txt_en: Sacrifice leads and gains follow.
txt_cn: 一分耕耘一分收获。

txt_en: Adversity is a great teacher.
txt_cn: 逆境教人成长。

txt_en: Home represents belonging.
txt_cn: 家是永远的港湾。

txt_en: The past is the past. We're observing the future.
txt_cn: 放下过去，着眼未来。

txt_en: Have a great summer.
txt_cn: 愿你拥有一个美好的夏天。

txt_en: No time is ever really wasted. Time reveals all.
txt_cn: 时间不会白白流逝，它终将揭示一切。

txt_en: Our future is up to us.
txt_cn: 未来掌握在自己手中。

txt_en: All victories inevitably come at a cost.
txt_cn: 所有的成功都需要有所付出。

txt_en: When the fight comes to you, you have to be ready to fight back.
txt_cn: 遇到困难学会迎难而上。

txt_en: Dreams don't work unless you do.
txt_cn: 努力奋斗才能梦想成真。

txt_en: You are what you love, not what loves you.
txt_cn: 成为自己热爱的模样，不必听从他人的喜恶。

txt_en: The fruit of everything good in life begins with a challenge.
txt_cn: 好事多磨。

txt_en: You can focus on what is lost or you can fight for what is left.
txt_cn: 与其被困于所失，不如奋力争未来。

txt_en: Desperate times call for desperate measures.
txt_cn: 绝处亦可逢生。

txt_en: Rest at the end, not in the middle.
txt_cn: 在抵达终点之前，永远不要停下脚步。

txt_en: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
txt_cn: 奢求未来不如把握当下。

txt_en: The course of true love never did run smooth.
txt_cn: 真爱之路，难免坎坷。

txt_en: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
txt_cn: 要么你掌控命运，要么你被命运掌控。

txt_en: Ease is a greater threat to progress than hardship.
txt_cn: 安逸比挫折更消磨斗志。

txt_en: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
txt_cn: 没有机会，就去创造机会。
